nodes.text: These Ancient Ruins were located next to a sarlacc on the planet of Tatooine. During the Clone Wars, a battle between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems broke out in the ruins, around the sarlacc. During the fight, the Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker was attacked by Count Dooku, but was able to Force push him into the sarlacc. Dooku was able to use the Force to get out before being eaten, and escaped.
